routes.blogTitle: How to add WebP images to your page
routes.intro: In this post I want to show you two different strategies for adding Googles new image format WebP, and the legacy browser issues to be considered in your implementation.
I will share how to get the full 100/100 Lighthouse score for your web app. The example will be this website itself, and I will walk you through the best to get there.
